title: Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 not working on some fields in the help search
description: When using Eclipse with DBCS locale, pressing ctrl+F1 on the first text field in the Help Search window does not trigger a help pop-up screen. This issue occurs on all DBCS languages and only happens on the first text field. Pressing ctrl+F1 on the subsequent fields works correctly.
EB:
OS: LinuxGTK
Build: RC2 with IBMJava2131 JRE

Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch Eclipse with DBCS locale.
2. Select 'Search' from the menu bar.
3. When the Help Search window pops up, click on the first text field and press ctrl+F1.

Expected Result:
A help pop-up screen should come up displaying information about the HelpSearch.

Actual Result:
Nothing happens.

Comments:
1. This issue occurs on all DBCS languages.
2. The attached screenshot highlights the specific field that is not responding to ctrl+F1 (circled in red), while fields circled in green work properly.
